X.T: Clay Shirky: Institutions vs. collaboration

ARTICLE.COMMENT: The very common idea that more and more projects succeed by collaboration rather than by administration. Despite the fact that nothing is new here, ClayShirky‚Äôs presentation is effective to describe this.
